duties_responsibilities.duty: Tracking and managing inventory accuracy of products.
Processing returns and recalls related to distributed products and filing necessary paperwork.
Ensuring customer orders are filled on time and accurately.
Researching and resolving count variances to ensure accurate inventory records.
Managing the daily returns process in the warehouse and in CRM.
Reviewing, processing, and intervening on all recall notices for products.
Transferring products to Emergency Drug Response Program (EDRP) sites in Distrack and shipping to sites using Varsity.
Tracking and reporting scrap levels and providing Finance a final report.
Identifying needs and shipping proper return packaging to customers for successful product return.
Handling expired product return from vendors and creating Debit Memos using Distrack and MIF Toolbars.

education_certification.credential: High school degree or GED preferred
